articles.title: Wednesday's COVID-19 report: More cases, fewer deaths, a lot more shots in the arm - WBAY
articles.description: The average number of new coronavirus cases in Wisconsin is at a 4-month low. Average daily deaths are at a 3-month low.
articles.content: MADISON, Wis. (WBAY) The average number of new coronavirus cases in Wisconsin is at a 4-month low. Average daily deaths are at a 3-month low. And completed vaccinations reached a new day-to-day high.… [+12833 chars]
